main.ukrSupport: Support the Ukrainian army to fight Russian invasion.
main.slogan: Ultimate open-source analytics to satisfy all your needs.
main.trackEveryMetric: 在不侵犯用户隐私的情况下跟踪您需要的每个指标。
main.description: Swetrix 为您的 Web 应用程序带来了高级且可定制的分析服务。
main.signupTerms: 注册即表示您同意我们的<tos>条款和条件</tos>以及<pp>隐私政策。</pp>
main.exploreService: 探索我们的服务或创建一个帐户。

coreFeatures.title: Core Analytics Features
coreFeatures.desc: Powerful and easy analytics to display all the metrics you need. Cookieless. No need to be a data scientist to understand our analytics.

marketplace.title: Marketplace & build-in Extensions
marketplace.desc1: Need additional features? Connect extensions or write your own! Now you do not need to use many sources from different systems - expand and supplement everything in one!
marketplace.desc2: Install extensions and sell your own. Came up with a great extension for your company? Great! Publish it on the marketplace and share your insights with the whole community.

list.label: GDPR
list.desc: data and processing based in EU zone.

list.question: Swetrix 跟踪是否需要 cookie？
list.answer:
不，不需要。 我们的分析脚本完全没有 cookie。 您无需在网站上使用 cookie 通知即可使用我们的服务。
我们遵守 《一般资料保护规范》、《隐私暨电子通讯规则》、《加州消费者隐私法》、《电子隐私指令》和 《儿童在线隐私权保护法》等法规。

list.question: 您是否使用/共享/出售最终用户的数据？
list.answer: 不，我们不会。此外，我们收集的所有数据都是匿名的。 我们不会存储任何可让识别特定用户身份的数据。我们尽量做到透明和尊重隐私。

list.question: 我需要为您们的服务付费吗？
list.answer: 我们提供免费和付费帐户。虽然付费级别的大部分功能都包含在免费级别中，但付费级别每月可提供更多的活动。您可以随时升级或降级您的帐户订阅。

list.question: 我的数据是否安全？
list.answer: 我们遵守有关数据存储和处理安全的所有标准。所有数据都安全存储，第三方无法访问，所有通信始终通过加密通道 (HTTPS) 进行。

features.name: Measure website traffic with 99% accuracy
features.desc: The most accurate analytics solution to track all basic metrics and see the RIGHT data.

features.name: Demo & Geo reports
features.desc: Yes, it's a standard. But we keep track of exactly where your users are from as it is.

features.name: UTM & Reffers tracking
features.desc: All the traffic from your companies and websites will be shown without a data loss.

features.name: Agile system
features.desc: A flexible system of settings for the basic rules of use - such as session definition, traffic accounting, and so on, is easy to set up and customise.

features.name:
Custom events
(really easy to setup)
features.desc: User-friendly interface and ease of setting goals will help you measure the effectiveness of your website.

features.name: User flow
features.desc: Track how users get to your site and where they go. Study the behaviour and patterns of your visitors.

main.demoGeoReports: Yes, it's a standard. But we keep track of exactly where your users are from as it is.

mFeatures.name: Expand your possibilities
mFeatures.desc: Browser extensions, notifications, 2FA, flexible functionality and more!

mFeatures.name: Opensource
mFeatures.desc: Customise Swetrix for your needs or selfhost it easily.

mFeatures.name: Marketplace options
mFeatures.desc: Marketplace with community made extensions to improve your analytic capabilities.

mFeatures.name: Easy integration
mFeatures.desc: Integrate your projects, add new extensions, dive into the world of analytics easily.

mFeatures.name: Solve your tasks, not create
mFeatures.desc: Get insights and use the best solutions to solve your problems.

mFeatures.name: Share your best solutions
mFeatures.desc: Share your best solutions with the community, get popularity and money.

main.becomeDevDesc: Write your extensions, follow the news and join our developer community.

lTestimonials.name: Alex
lTestimonials.desc:
We use several analytics systems for the project in order to obtain the most accurate data.
For web analytics, we chose Swetrix as a solution where the team is constantly making new improvements and features.

lTestimonials.name: Michael
lTestimonials.desc:
In business, I need to understand how customers behave on a website and why they buy or don't buy my product.
Swetrix gives me the necessary data and valuable insights to understand my website visitors and help me increase sales.

lTestimonials.name: Rachel
lTestimonials.desc:
I am working on a fairly large project and we need to comply with the GDPR agreements and a number of other requirements.
We work with large companies around the world and visitors to our resources want to see that we are loyal to them, but at the same time allow our department to increase conversion on the site and receive valuable insights to test new product hypotheses.
These tasks are completely solved by Swetrix.

opensource.desc: Install Swetrix on your own servers - the source code is available to everyone.
Find bugs and suggest improvements - the community will be grateful to you.
Your data is protected, all the features and fixes are implemented in a matter of days by our developers.

main.os: <gradi>Open source</gradi> analytics - a powerful and simple tool.
main.custSupport: Could not find the answer you're looking for? Reach out to our <mail>customer support</mail> team.
main.statsDesc: Swetrix的服务强大，同时处理千万用户的数据访问

forgot.sent: 密码重置邮件已发送至指定地址

signin.title: 登录您的账户
signin.2faDesc:
Open the two-factor authentication app on your device to view your authentication code and verify your identity.
You can also use your backup code.

signup.tos: 我接受<tos>条款和条件</tos>以及<pp>隐私政策</pp>。

common.xCharsError: 密码必须至少包含 {{amount}} 个字符。
common.badEmailError: 请提供有效的电子邮件。
common.passwordTooLong: 您的密码过长最大长度为 {{amount}}
common.tosError: 您必须接受我们的《服务条款》 和《隐私政策》才能使用我们的服务。
common.checkLeakedPasswordDesc: 当启用时，我们使用 <db> {{database}} </db> 数据库检查您的密码。我们不会把你的密码直接上传至服务器。首先，我们对密码进行哈希处理(使用SHA1)，并将该哈希的前5个字符发送给服务器。服务器将返回所有以这5个字符开头的泄露密码。在我们的服务器中，我们会检查其中一个是否与您的密码匹配。如果之前泄露过，我们会给您一个警告。我们从不以纯文本存储您的密码。

features.feature1Content:
在 Swetrix，我们相信每个人都享有隐私权和透明度。尤其是在分析方面。
我们不会收集超越我们<docs>声明</docs>范围的信息，所有数据都存储在位于欧盟的服务器上，我们的分析脚本是公开可用的，并且可以通过我们的 <gh>Github</gh>访问。
features.feature2Content:
需要快速查看您网站的统计数据?
我们已经开发了<chrome>Chrome</chrome>和<firefox>Firefox</firefox>扩展插件。
使用这些，你可以立即查看最重要的见解，收到流量峰值通知和更多!
features.ready: 准备好了解您的用户了吗？

list.name: Performance monitoring
list.content:
With Swetrix you can stop guessing how fast does your website load across the globe.
We offer a wide range of metrics, such as page load time, DNS lookup time, TTFB and more.
You can see data breakdowns by time spent on frontend, backend or network, view this data for the specific countries, browsers, devices.
All of this is available in real-time, so you can see how your website performs at any given moment.

list.name: Custom alerts
list.content:
Do you want to track traffic spikes? Or maybe the pageviews for a specific time period? All this is available with custom alerts.
You can set up alerts for a wide range of metrics and receive notifications via messengers like Telegram when they get triggered.

list.name: Extensions & Extension Marketplace
list.content: Is there some feature missing or you want to modify the Dashboard specifically for your needs? All of this is possible with Swetrix Extensions: we offer a customisable SDK which will allow you to modify the dashboard in any way you want, you can also publish your extension for other people to use or install addons people created from our Extension Marketplace.

list.name: AI forecasting
list.content: You can forecast your website traffic with our AI-powered forecasting tool.

list.name: Public & Shared Dashboards
list.content:
With Swetrix you can make your dashboard available for other people to view.
You can also invite other Swetrix users to your projects, assign different roles to them.

list.name: Simplicity
list.content:
When we created our service we tried to make it as simple and flexible as possible.
No more confusing metrics and complicated dashboards - with us you can have control over all your projects and data in a simple and straightforward way.

list.name: 页面查看跟踪
list.content:
Swetrix 提供了跟踪页面浏览量的能力，包括独特的浏览量和用户流。
所有视图都包含广泛的数据，例如用户国家、区域设置、设备类型、页面加载时间等。
我们不使用 cookie 或任何其他类型的用户分析来收集数据。

list.name: 自定义活动跟踪
list.content:
除了跟踪页面浏览量，我们还提供跟踪自定义活动的功能。
您可以跟踪任何活动，例如按钮点击、注册或授权。
所有这些对用户来说也是完全私有的，因为我们不会将他们的任何其他信息与活动一起存储。
您可以在我们的文档中阅读有关自定义活动的更多信息。

list.name: 开发者 API
list.content:
We offer a developer API, which allows you to integrate Swetrix into your own applications.
You can use our API to create custom dashboards, or to integrate Swetrix into your own applications.

list.name: Convenience
list.content:
Besides the big features we try to focus on small things that make any project better.
You can customise Swetrix for your needs, for example use your native language or your favourite theme, set up 2FA, use a timezone or a time notation you prefer.

list.name: 速度
list.content: 我们速度很快。我们的分析脚本尽可能优化并使用 CDN 进行交付，这确保脚本不会减慢您的网站速度。

list.name: 相信
list.content:
我们是一家小企业，不是大公司。
我们感兴趣的是创造一种优质的产品，以便满意客户使用，而不是从我们的用户那里榨取尽可能多的钱或出售您的个人数据。

profileSettings.frequency: 我们应该多久向您发送一封有关您网站的电子邮件摘要？
profileSettings.noLink: 没有收到确认电子邮件地址的链接？ 请求一个新的！
profileSettings.deactivateConfirmation:
您确定要停用您的帐户吗？
您的所有数据都将从我们的服务器中永久删除。
此操作无法撤消。
profileSettings.exportConfirmation:
根据《一般数据保护条例》 (GDPR) 第 20 条的要求，您有权接收我们存储的您的个人数据。此报告不包括每个项目的活动数据。
数据报告将发送到您的电子邮件地址。
注：您每两周只能请求一次数据导出。
profileSettings.reportSent: 《一般数据保护条例》数据报告已发送至您的电子邮件地址。
profileSettings.tryAgainInXDays: 请稍后再试。您每 {{amount}} 天只能请求一次 《一般数据保护条例》导出。
profileSettings.confTimeout: 电子邮件已发送，请检查您的邮箱或过几分钟再试
profileSettings.confSent: 账户确认链接已发送至您的邮箱
profileSettings.noConfLeft:
很遗憾，您的电子邮件确认请求已用完。
请确保您能够接收电子邮件并再次检查您的垃圾邮件文件夹中的邮件。
您可以尝试使用其他电子邮件地址或 联系我们的客户支持服务。
profileSettings.timezoneDesc:
This will be the time zone in which the data is displayed. It's only used for visualization.
No data will be modified based on this setting.
profileSettings.quitProject: Are you sure you want to quit this project?
profileSettings.noSharedProjects: Nobody is sharing a project with you yet.
profileSettings.2faEnable: Enable 2FA to make your account more secure.
profileSettings.2faDesc: An authenticator app that supports time-based, one-time passwords (TOTP) such as andOTP or Google Authenticator can scan the QR code below to enable 2FA on your Swetrix account:
profileSettings.2faQRAlt:
Can't scan the QR code?
Use this secret key instead: {{key}}
profileSettings.enter2faToEnable: Enter your one-time code to enable 2FA
profileSettings.enter2faToDisable: Enter your one-time code or a recovery code
profileSettings.2faRecoveryNote:
Important: If you cannot use your authenticator app, because you've deleted the app or lost your device, you'll need a way to access your account and disable 2FA.

You can use this recovery code to disable 2FA. Write it down and store it in a safe, secure place.
profileSettings.2faRecoverySaved: I have saved this recovery code
profileSettings.2faEnabled: Two-factor authenticated is enabled on your account.
profileSettings.2faDisableHint: To disable two-factor authentication, please enter your 6-digit code or one of your recovery codes below.
profileSettings.noApiKey: You haven't created any API keys yet.
profileSettings.apiKeyWarning: Treat your API Key like a password and keep it secret. Never hardcode it into your programs, or share it with anyone.
profileSettings.apiKeyDeleteConf:
Are you sure you want to delete your API key?
All API access via this key will be disabled.
profileSettings.integrationsDesc: Integrations can be used to connect your favourite messengers to Swetrix and receive updates such as notifications, reports or alerts directly.

integrationsList.telegram: Receive notifications directly into a Telegram bot.
integrationsList.tgHint: Write a message to <url>{{username}}</url> to get your chat ID. This bot will be used later to send you notifications or alerts.

profileSettings.socialisationsDesc: Socialisation feature allows you to link 3rd party accounts (like Google or Twitter) to your Swetrix account and use them to sign in to Swetrix.
profileSettings.cantUnlinkSocialisation: You can't unlink this socialisation because it was used to register your account.
profileSettings.selectTimeFormat: This will be the time notation used on the chart, it is only used to visualise the data on the chart in 12 hour or 24 hour format.
profileSettings.regenerateSecretKeyMessage:
Are you sure you want to regenerate your secret key?
All the existing CAPTCHA widgets will stop working and you will need to update them with the new secret key.
profileSettings.captchaSecretKeyHint: This is your secret key, it is used to verify the CAPTCHA response on your server. Keep it secret and do not share it with anyone.

dashboard.verifyEmailTitle: 请先验证电子邮件地址
dashboard.verifyEmailDesc:
若要开始使用我们的服务并创建您的项目，您首先需要确认您的电子邮件地址。

确认您的帐户的链接已发送到您在注册时提供的电子邮件地址，如果未发送 - 您可以在帐户设置中再次请求链接。
dashboard.lowEventsTitle: You are running out of events!
dashboard.lowEventsDesc:
You have used more than 85% of the available events per your tier for this month.
That means that in case you use 100% of the available events until the end of the month, all the subsequent traffic will not be saved.
To avoid this we recommend that you update your tier on the Billing page.
dashboard.eventsXPercUsed: You have used more than {{amount}}% of the available events per your tier for this month.
dashboard.createProject: 在此处创建一个新项目以开始使用我们的服务
dashboard.invitationDesc:
You have been invited to join the project {{project}}.
You can either accept the invitation here or reject it in your account settings.
dashboard.alertsDesc:
Automated alerts are a powerful tool that allow you to run automated tasks when specific events occur.
We can automatically monitor your project for traffic spikes and notify you via Telegram.

alert.noIntegration: You have not configured an integration yet. Create one in your <url>account settings</url>.
alert.deleteHint:
This action is irreversible.
The alert and all the data related to it will be deleted from our servers.
alert.name: Alert name
alert.enabledHint: Disabled alerts will not notify you of any events.

notFoundPage.title: Page not found
notFoundPage.description:
Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
Please check the URL in the address bar and try again.

project.ad: 你的网站需要这些数据吗？
project.noEvContent:
在指定的时间范围内没有捕获任何活动。
如果您还没有跟踪任何活动，您可以查看我们的<url>文档</url>以轻松地将跟踪集成到您的应用中。
project.noCaptchaEv:
No events have been captured for the specified timeframe.
If you haven't set up CAPTCHA yet, you can check out our <url>Docs</url> to easily integrate it into your app.
project.conflictMetric: The metric you selected conflicts with an already selected one
project.codeExample: Or insert the following code into your website to track your events:

settings.verify: 请先验证您的电子邮件地址
settings.pxCharsError: 项目名称不能超过 {{amount}} 个字符。
settings.oxCharsError: 允许的来源列表必须小于 {{amount}} 符号
settings.name: 项目名称
settings.originsHint:
允许将脚本与您的 ProjectID 一起使用的来源（域）列表，以逗号分隔。
将其留空以允许所有来源（默认设置）。
例如：cornell.edu, app.example。 com, ssu.gov.ua
settings.enabledHint:
禁用的项目不会计算任何新传入的活动或浏览量。
您仍然可以在管理面板中访问项目的分析。
settings.publicHint:
通过勾选此项，互联网上的任何人（包括 Google）都可以看到该项目的管理面板。
只有项目的管理员可以编辑设置。
settings.createHint: *您在创建项目后将能够更彻底地进行设置
settings.deleteHint:
通过按“删除项目”，您了解此操作是不可逆的。
该项目及其所有相关数据将从我们的服务器中删除。
settings.resetHint:
By pressing 'Reset project' you understand, that this action is irreversible.
The project's pageviews and custom events will be removed from our servers, but the project identifier and other configuration will be retained.
settings.noPeople: No people have been added to this project yet.
settings.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop sharing your project with this user?
settings.removeReportConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop sending project reports this user?
settings.inviteDesc:
Enter an email address and a role of the person you want to share your project with.
We shall contact them over email to offer the access to the project.
settings.inviteExpity: The invitation will expire in {{amount}} hours.

admin.name: Administrator
admin.desc: Can manage the project's settings, add/remove members, and invite new users.

viewer.name: Viewer
viewer.desc: Has a read-only access to the project.

settings.ipBlacklistHint:
A list of IP addresses from which no analytics will be collected on this project.
This functionality is handy if you want to ignore analytics from your IP, for example.
Example: 172.126.10.16, 192.168.0.1/32, ::1
settings.transferHint:
You can transfer '{{name}}' project to another user.
This user will become the project's owner and will be able to manage the project's settings, add/remove members, and invite new users.
You will be assigned to the project as an administrator. However, the new owner will be able to remove you from the project.

reseted.allHint: All of the project's related analytics data will be permanently removed from our servers, but the project itself, it's settings and the ID will still be available.
reseted.partiallyDesc: The 'Reset partially' function allows you to reset the data of a specific project within a given date range.
reseted.partiallyHint:
To reset the data of a specific project within a date range, select the start and end dates of the range and the project you wish to reset.
Double-check that you have selected the correct project and date range before clicking 'Reset'.
Once you click 'Reset', all the data associated with the selected project within the selected date range will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.

settings.name: CAPTCHA project name
settings.enabledHint:
Disabled CAPTCHA projects will not count any newly incoming events.
You will still be able to access the analytics in dashboard.

emails.title: Email reports
emails.description: Send regular email reports to as many recipients as you want

billing.title: 账单和计划
billing.desc:
我们提供免费服务。
如果您需要处理更多流量，您可能需要升级您的计划。
以下是现有计划列表。没有隐藏费用或其他隐蔽条款，清晰透明！
billing.contact:
Need to track more than {{amount}} million events per month?
Contact us at <mail>{{email}}</mail> to discuss your needs.
billing.noSubWarning:
You don't have an active subscription.
No new analytics data will be stored into our database. You can still view the data that was collected before the subscription was cancelled.
billing.cancelledSubMessage:
You've cancelled your subscription.
The subscription will be active until {{date}}.
After that, no new analytics data will be stored into our database. You can still view the data that was collected before the subscription was cancelled.

paidFeature.title: Upgrade your plan to use this feature
paidFeature.desc:
We apologise for the inconvenience, but you must subscribe to a paid plan to use this feature.

We realise that you might not be ready to buy a paid subscription yet, but buying it will give you not only access to this feature, but also many other great perks, such as access to all the other paid features, higher limits on visits per month and number of websites available, and you will support the growth of a small business :)

forecast.title: Traffic forecast
forecast.desc: This is a rough estimate of how much traffic you can expect to get on your website, based on Swetrix AI models.
forecast.input: The quantity of '{{frequency}}' you want to forecast

pricing.title: 定价计划
pricing.adv:
免费开始，无需信用卡。
当您的业务增长时，您可以随时升级您的计划。

tiers.smallBusiSupport: By buying this you are supporting a small business.

pricing.downgradeDesc:
降级后，你的套餐将减少可用内容。如果您的网站流量超过了降级的套餐，这将导致无法记录在我们的数据库中。
你可以随时回到之前的套餐。
如果您有任何问题，请随时发送电子邮件至 {{email}}。
pricing.cancelTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
pricing.cancelDesc:
After cancelling your subscription, no new events will be collected by Swetrix for your projects.
You will be able to return to your current plan at any time.
If you have any questions, you can always email us at {{email}}.

contact.howTo: Have something to ask? There are several ways on how to contact us:

ways.email: You can drop us an email at <mail>{{email}}</mail>
ways.discord: Join our Discord server by following <url>this link</url>
ways.chat: Use a chatbox located on the bottom right of this page

beta.title: 测试版
beta.description: This feature is in the Beta phase. Use it with caution as there may be side effects.

press.description: Our assets for use in your articles and other media. If you use any of the assets below, we'd be grateful if you'd leave a link to one of our pages on your website. If you need other assets or have any questions, please <url>contact us</url>.

font.title: Font
font.description: We use {{font}} font on Swetrix websites. See more information about it on it's <url>official website</url>.

titles.main: Ultimate open-source analytics to satisfy all your needs

footer.slogan: 最好的应用需要最好的服务。
footer.description: Swetrix 是一个尊重用户隐私的强大分析平台
